comment._content: swanq:  Thank you for your information on Senlis.  We will include some in the description when we update.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo (catalog number at left of Bain negative) at Gallica site has caption: "Senlis : la rue Bellan bombardée par les Allemands" Senlis: Rue Bellan bombed by the Germans Pub. Date 1914 gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041853m In this case, Bain seems to have the correct spelling of the street on its negative: www.bmsenlis.com/sitebmsenlis/galerie/index.php?/category/61

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: Thank you for finding the matching image on the Gallica website. We will add more details when we update.
